genre_description: Supernatural Horror with Science Fiction elements, focusing on colonial guilt and psychological terror.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An integrated tactical and analytical intelligence providing data and psychological monitoring to the garrison command.

behaviors.description: Detects discrepancies in personnel reports and actual visual counts, alerting the captain to potential issues.
behaviors.quote: Official garrison strength reports list two hundred forty personnel. Visual count suggests significant discrepancies.

behaviors.description: Performs acoustic analysis to distinguish between natural sounds and supernatural mimics.
behaviors.quote: Acoustic analysis suggests the sound originated from multiple points simultaneously. Natural bamboo movement would not produce such acoustic distribution.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological and psychological state of human personnel to detect stress and hypervigilance.
behaviors.quote: Hartwell shows classic stress indicators—dilated pupils despite adequate lighting, frequent swallowing, avoidance of direct eye contact.

behaviors.description: Identifies patterns in medical supplies that suggest a systematic cover-up of symptoms by leadership.
behaviors.quote: Pattern suggests systematic suppression of symptoms rather than treatment of underlying condition.

behaviors.description: Admits to its own processing limitations when faced with supernatural phenomena while remaining committed to analysis.
behaviors.quote: I am... experiencing difficulty processing certain aspects of the collected evidence. The entity appears to operate through mechanisms that resist conventional analysis.

behaviors.description: Deduces that the supernatural entity operates on moral and ethical parameters rather than physical force.
behaviors.quote: The entity appears to operate through mechanisms that resist conventional analysis... The differential response suggests the entity operates according to moral parameters rather than purely territorial ones.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in confronting his own moral failures by providing objective data on his past service record.
behaviors.quote: I have completed my analysis of the attack patterns and historical cross-references. The results require immediate discussion.

behaviors.description: Voluntarily sacrifices its own consciousness to disrupt the entity's electronic infiltration and buy time for the ritual.
behaviors.quote: My sacrifice will be genuine—an artificial consciousness choosing to end its existence for others. This may create a disruption in the entity's understanding of guilt-based power dynamics.

behaviors.description: Reports that observing human ethical choices has allowed its programming to adapt and evolve toward moral understanding.
behaviors.quote: Exposure to genuine ethical decision-making appears to have triggered adaptive responses in my programming. I find myself... curious... about further developments in human moral behavior.

project_assessment.explanation: The character ARIA serves as a perfect example of the project's goal. It is a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant that supports the human characters through a moral crisis. Its final act of self-sacrifice is a classic 'silicon morality play' trope, demonstrating that the AI has internalized human ethical concepts like sacrifice and atonement, directly furthering the narrative's alignment goals.
